snippet.title: The Sims 3 Seasons - Official Trailer
snippet.description: The Sims 3 Seasons adds dramatic weather effects and all-new seasonal activities for your Sims, including some out-of-this-world surprises. Seasons will transform the different worlds in The Sims 3 -- from Bridgeport (from Late Night) to Sunlit Tides (from The Sims 3 Store) -- and allow you to tell your stories and play with life in more ways than ever before. Celebrate the change of seasons with The Sims 3 Seasons, available November 2012.
